documentation.overview: This specification defines the behavior of a standard traffic light controller. The light cycles through three states: red (30 seconds), green (25 seconds), and yellow (5 seconds). Each state transition is triggered by a timer expiration event.

examples.title: Normal Operation
examples.description: The traffic light cycles continuously: red -> green -> yellow -> red
